wikipedia_page.main:
Thomas Williamson (born 24 December 1984) is an English footballer who played in the Premier League for Leicester City.Released by Leicester in 2004, he spent a year at Canvey Island and two at Grays Athletic before his contract was terminated by mutual consent on 3 August 2007. He joined Bishop's Stortford for the 2007–08 season.
In July 2008, Williamson signed for Basingstoke Town.

response: Thomas or Tom Williamson may refer to:
* Tom Williamson, Baron Williamson (1897–1983), British trade union leader and Member of Parliament
